item.title: CVE-2024-31245|2024-04-10T15:52:20.321Z -- ConvertKit -- ConvertKit
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in ConvertKit.This issue affects ConvertKit: from n/a through 2.4.5.
